Summary: Golf ball like object seen hovering, no sounds
divs: sighting detailsi was at at a golf course in alameda on sat 4\14\12 (approx. 3pm)and one of the guys i was playing with just hit his drive and he said "i popped it up".... so i looked up and i saw this white object that looked like a golf ball. and i looked at it and looked at it and it didn't move. mind you it was really windy(25-30 mph gusts) and not a cloud in the sky. yet this object did not move or even make a noise. so i turned to the rest of our group and i said jokingly " hey i thought that was your ball" as i pointed towards the object in the sky. everyone stood and stared at this object not knowing what to say or think....i hesitated and then i said "i didn't think you could see saturn today."..as we were golfing next to an airport it was quite clear this was not a plane or helicopter. as it had no obvious sign of direction, did not appear to make a sound and did i mention it looked like a golf ball. we proceeded down the fairway and it did not move, much like you would expect from looking at the moon. when we got to the green (aprox. 1 minute later)we all looked around and it had vanished. it was no where to seen...we looked and looked as if expecting to see that it was just a ballon or blimp or anything. but it was gone........
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Alameda
There was one other sighting in Alameda on or around April 14th 2012
